compliant.section: NUVOTON's control and as such, we are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of any linked websites and online applications.
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 28 of the GDPR, which outlines the responsibilities of data controllers when engaging data processors. By stating they are not responsible for third-party websites, they are essentially indicating those sites are independent controllers.

compliant.section: If you choose to use any third party websites or applications or leave our SERVICE, any Personal Information collected by the third party's website or application will be subject to any existing privacy policy of that third party.
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with the transparency principle and the requirement to inform users about third-party data sharing (Articles 13 & 14).

compliant.section: We strongly recommend that you take the time to carefully review the privacy policies of any third parties to which you provide Personal Information.
compliant.legal provisions: This encourages user awareness and aligns with the GDPR's emphasis on informed consent and transparency (Articles 12 & 13).
